title: I Swear
lyrics:
[intro] (D)
I (D)swear
By the (Bm)moon and stars in the (F#m)sky (G-A)
And I (D)swear
Like the (Bm)shadow that's by your (F#m)side (F#m)
 
(D) I see the (G)questions (A)in your (D)eyes
I know what's (G)weighing (A)on your (Bm)mind
But you can be (G)sure I know my (A)part (A)
 
'Cause (D)I…'ll stand be(G)side you (A)through the (D)years
You'll only (G)cry those (A)happy (Bm)tears
And though I'll (D)make mistakes
(E7)I'll never break your (A)heart
 
[chorus]
And I (D)swear
By the (Bm)moon and stars in the (F#m)sky
I'll be (G)there (A)
I (D)swear
Like the (Bm)shadow that's by your (F#m)side
I'll be (G)there (A)
For (Em)better or worse
'Til (A)death do us part
I'll (Em)love you with every (A)beat of my heart
And I (D) swear (D)
 
(D) I'll give you (G)every(A)thing I (D)can
I'll build your (G)dreams with (A)these two (Bm)hands
We'll hang some (G)memories on the (A)wall
 
And (D)when... just the (G)two of (A)us are (D)there
You won't have to (G)ask if (A)I still (Bm)care
'Cause as (D)time turns the page
My (E7)love won't age at (A)all
 
[chorus]
And I (D)swear (I swear)
By the (Bm)moon and stars in the (F#m)sky
I'll be (G)there (I’ll be (A)there)
I (D)swear (I swear)
Like the (Bm)shadow that's by your (F#m)side
I'll be (G)there (I’ll be (A)there)
For (Em)better or worse
'Til (A)death do us part
I'll (Em)love you with every (A)beat of my heart
And I (D-single strum)swear [end]
